entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StackOverflow in Test_Windows_CoreClr_Release CI #62222
  • Rename option "Include overloads" doesn't work #62221
  • Restrict values that trigger "Convert to Utf-8 string" analyzer #62207
  • Stack Trace Explorer Accessibility Insights Fix #62206
  • Read SmartIndent option from IEditorOptions #62204
  • GoToDefinition integration tests failed due to empty file #62188
  • Unused usings not faded #62183
  • API proposal: Expose functionality of `SyntaxGenerator.TypedConstantExpression` via a better method #62181
    Compiler.Next
  • Typo in API name: `ShouldShowItemsFromUnimportNamspaces` #62177

Closed

  • Complete Statement does not work for switch expressions #57213
    17.3
  • `CscCompile_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ProducesLibrary` fails locally #61452
    17.3
  • `ConstantValueToStringTest01` fails locally #61450
  • IDE0063 could produce invalid code #58911
    Backlog
  • It seems like a syntax parser bug when combined `switch` statement and a wrong open square bracket `[` token #62126
    17.3
  • Please allow [assembly: TypeForwardedTo(typeof(T))] when T is [Obsolete] #61264
    Compiler.Next
  • Detect `if (x == null) x = ...` and offer to convert to `x ??= ...` #54974
    Backlog
  • Support `if` pattern in "use null coalescing assignment" refactoring #32985
    Backlog
  • TryCalculateRequiredMembers throws exceptions if there's duplicate required members #62062
    17.4
  • Incomplete record inheritance syntax produces a lot of nonsense compiler errors #62051
  • Null coalescing does not work as expected with types that have implicit operators #62184
    17.3
  • IDE0055 (Fix formatting) errors after upgrading to SDK 6.0.300 #61433
    Backlog
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61977
  • EnC: Allow deleting methods #61678
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry-pick 62053 to release/dev17.3 #62220
    Area-IDE
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for file-types in SymbolKey. #62218
    Area-IDE
  • Add two more integration tests for InheritanceMargin #62217
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify symbol key creation/resolution for named types #62216
    Area-IDE
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE
  • Migrate FabricBot Tasks to Config-as-Code #62212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Synch handlers with fix #62209
    Area-IDE
  • Use new analyzer/fixer in roslyn #62202
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #62200
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Snap release/dev17.4 to main #62196
    Area-IDE
  • Snap main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62194
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow ref field to ref struct #62186
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.3
  • Make sure spans are valid before trying to get exception regions #62178
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update xunit runners to move off Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #62168
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor lazy diagnostic info refactoring #62091
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve trivia handling in use-compound-coalesce. #62205
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow to forward obsolete types without any diagnostics. #62127
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62213
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Don't include [Skip-SymbolCheck] in insertions #62211
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Snap main to release/dev17.3 #62195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo #62192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.3p3 snap #62198
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update 'use coalece assignment' fixer to support additional common use case. #62191
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62190
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Revert "Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers" #62189
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62180
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62175
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Handle error scenarios with duplicate required fields #62172
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Update ref fields status #62167
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Add LegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService for OmniSharp EA #62163
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation in incremental generator #62100
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, 17.3 P3

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62223
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62164
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Cover module naming style under class #62141
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly set the VS.Core.Version property #58799
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • State Machine EnC follow-up #62170
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Track used local constants in attributes #62158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • EnC: Log more info to in-memory buffer to simplify dump analysis #62070
    Area-Interactive
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #62171
    Area-IDE
